name: scrivener
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone whose job involved writing documents or dealing with written documents: The scrivener probably cleaned up the writing on the letter when he was copying it. Their wills, drawn up by scriveners, bore only their marks.
More examplesFewer examplesWilkinson was not acting as a lawyer, but as a mere scrivener.The erroneous information was simply a "scrivener's error".Professional scriveners sat at their desks, quills and parchment at the ready, to draw up wills, indentures, and bills of sale.
